00019 #ifndef BETA_H
00020 #define BETA_H
00021 
00022 #include "graph.h"
00023 #include "label.h"
00024 #include "distanceList.h"
00025 
00026 // This class compute the beta_k value of the vertices of a labelled graph
00027 // For each labelled vertex v of a graph, it computes the set of triples (d,k,l)
00028 // where k is the number of vertices labelled by l at distance d from v 
00029 
00030 class Beta {
00031         public :
00032         // constructor
00033         // tg, the graph and tdMax the maximal distance
00034         Beta(Graph * tg, int tdMax) {
00035                 g=tg; dMax = tdMax;
00036                 bSeen = new short[g->getOrder()];
00037                 lFreq = new short[g->getOrder()];
00038                 lStack = new short[g->getOrder()];
00039                 dl = new DistanceList(g,dMax);
00040         }
00041         
00042         // destructor
00043         ~Beta(void) {
00044                 delete[] bSeen;
00045                 delete[] lFreq;
00046                 delete[] lStack;
00047                 delete dl;
00048         }
00049         
00050         // to run only one time before use the class
00051         void init(void) {
00052                 return;
00053         }
00054         
00055         // to call when begining the first call to compute
00056         void initCompute(void) {
00057                 int i;
00058                 for(i = 0 ; i < g->getOrder() ; i++) {
00059                         bSeen[i]=-1;
00060                 }
00061         }
00062         
00063         // compute the vector corresponding to Beta_k(v)
00064         // t is the vector, t[0]=\alpha(v) then t[1]t[2][3]=(d,k,\alpha)...
00065         // return the size of t
00066         // each element of bSeen must be < v when called
00067         short compute(short v, short *t, Label * l) {
00068                 short i,d;
00069                 short ltemp, tempNbLabel;
00070                 short currentPosInT = 0;
00071                 
00072                 // we set the first part only composed of the label of v
00073                 t[0] = l->getLabel(v);
00074                 currentPosInT = 1;
00075 
00076                 dl->computeDistanceForVertex(v);                
00077                 // for each distance
00078                 for(d = 1 ; d <= dMax ; d++) {
00079                         
00080                         // we get the multiset of labels of the vertices at distance of d from  v
00081                         // bSeen[l]=v if l is soon seen at distance d from v
00082                         // lFreq[l]=number of vertices at distance d from v and having the label l
00083                         // lStack contains the labels at distance d from v
00084                         tempNbLabel = 0;
00085                         
00086                         // for each 
00087                         for(i = dl->getNbByDistanceMax(v,d-1) ; i < dl->getNbByDistanceMax(v,d) ; i++) {
00088                                 ltemp = l->getLabel(dl->getKIThVertex(v,i));
00089                                 
00090                                 
00091                                 // if new label
00092                                 if(bSeen[ltemp] < v) {
00093                                         bSeen[ltemp] = v;
00094                                         lFreq[ltemp] = 1;
00095                                         lStack[tempNbLabel] = ltemp;
00096                                         tempNbLabel++;
00097                                 } else {
00098                                         lFreq[ltemp]++;
00099                                 }
00100                         }
00101                         
00102                         // we sort the seen label
00103                         quickSort(lStack,0,tempNbLabel-1);
00104                         
00105                         
00106                         // we clear the seen label (for the next execution)
00107                         for(i = 0 ; i < tempNbLabel ; i++) {
00108                                 bSeen[lStack[i]] = -1;
00109                         }
00110                         
00111                         // we build the vector
00112                         for(i = 0 ; i < tempNbLabel ; i++) {
00113                                 t[currentPosInT] = d;
00114                                 t[currentPosInT+1] = lStack[i];
00115                                 t[currentPosInT+2] = lFreq[lStack[i]];
00116                                 currentPosInT+=3;
00117                         }
00118                         
00119                 }
00120                 
00121                 return currentPosInT;
00122         };
00123         
00124         // set t[u]=n for each vertex such that 1 <= d(u,v) <=dMax
00125         void mark(int v, short * t, int n) {
00126                 int i;
00127                 int nbMax = dl->getNbByDistanceMax(v,dMax);
00128                 for(i = 1 ; i < nbMax ; i++) {
00129                         t[dl->getKIThVertex(v,i)]=n;
00130                 }
00131                 return;
00132         }
00133         
00134         protected :
00135         
00136         Graph * g;
00137         int dMax;
00138         DistanceList * dl;
00139                 
00140         short * bSeen; // temp used to know if a label has been seen
00141         short * lFreq; // frequency of a label
00142         short * lStack; // stack that contains all the labels seen
00143         
00144         
00145         
00146   // used for sorting
00147         
00148         int partition(short * a, short p, short r) {
00149                 int x = a[r];
00150                 int j = p - 1;
00151                 for (int i = p; i < r; i++) {
00152                         if (x <= a[i]) {
00153                                 j = j + 1;
00154                                 int temp = a[j];
00155                                 a[j] = a[i];
00156                                 a[i] = temp;
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159                 a[r] = a[j + 1];
00160                 a[j + 1] = x;
00161                 return (j + 1);
00162         }
00163         
00164         void quickSort(short * a, short p, short r) {
00165                 if (p < r) {
00166                         int q = partition(a, p, r);
00167                         quickSort(a, p, q - 1);
00168                         quickSort(a, q + 1, r);
00169                 }
00170         }
00171         
00172         
00173         
00174         
00175 };
00176 
00177 #endif
Generated on Sun Apr 12 22:47:10 2009 for Minion by  1.5.8
